    • Method Detail

      • displayPermissionRequest

        public android.text.SpannableStringBuilder displayPermissionRequest(PermissionRequest pr)
        Returns a SpannableStringBuilder containing a String representation of the PermissionRequest given as a parameter. The customizable parts of the contract such as name, date and so on, will be shown with Bitter Lemon color. This method is called from the ProcessRequestActivity class, when a user selects a pending PermissionRequest.
        Parameters:
        pr - A PermissionRequest Object
        Returns:
        A SpannableStringBuilder Object

      • displayInviteRequest

        public android.text.SpannableStringBuilder displayInviteRequest(java.lang.String orgName)
        Returns a SpannableStringBuilder Object with the String parameter shown in the color Bitter Lemon This method is called from the ProcessInviteActivity class when the user selects a pending InviteRequest
        Parameters:
        orgName - A String representation of the name of an organisation
        Returns:
        A SpannableStringBuilder Object

      • displayConsentcoin

        public android.text.SpannableStringBuilder displayConsentcoin(java.lang.String id,
                                                              java.lang.String mem,
                                                              java.lang.String org,
                                                              java.lang.String type)
        Returns a SpannableStringBuilder containing a String representation of the Strings given as parameters. The parameters will be shown with Bitter Lemon color. This method is called from the MyConsentcoinActivity class, when a user selects a Consentcoin.
        Parameters:
        id - A String with the ID of a Consentcoin
        mem - A string with the name of af Member
        org - A String with the name of an organization
        type - A String with the type of contract
        Returns:
        A SpannableStringBuilder Object

      • createContractText

        public android.text.SpannableStringBuilder createContractText(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> contractElements,
                                                              int color,
                                                              int font)
        Returns a single SpannableStringBuilder with all the Strings and SpannableStringBuilderObjects from the contractElements ArrayList. It iterates through the ArrayList using the instanceof operator to check whether an Object from the ArrayList is String or a spannableStringBuilder. If it is a String it wil set its color to Rich Black, and if it is a SpannableStringBuilder it will set its color to the color specified in the parameters. After the color is changed all Objects is set to the specified font from the parameters, and then added to new SpannableStringBuilder, which is returned when the foreach loop is done

        NOTE: The color will only change if the device running the app is running API 23 or higher

        Parameters:
        contractElements - An ArrayList of Objects, either Strings or SpannableStringBuilders
        color - The int representation of a color from the colors.xml file
        font - The int representation of a font from the res/font folder
        Returns:
        A SpannableStringBuilder Object

      • setColorOfElement

        public android.text.SpannableStringBuilder setColorOfElement(android.text.SpannableStringBuilder e,
                                                             int color)
        Returns a SpannableStringBuilder in the color specified from the parameter.

        NOTE: This method will only be used if the device running the app is running API 23 or higher

        Parameters:
        e - A SpannableStringBuilder Object
        color - The int representation of a color from colors.xml
        Returns:
        A SpannableStringBuilder
